title: No accidents
creator_credit: Scottish Films and Stanley L Russell
brief_description: Accidents in factories cause personal suffering and loss of production. Most of them can be prevented by care and forethought. The film shows the kind of accident risks that exist in factories and how they can be prevented.
description: Accidents in factories cause personal suffering and loss of production. Most of them can be prevented by care and forethought. The film shows the kind of accident risks that exist in factories and how they can be prevented.
